name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Positively | New tab page with daily affirmations

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best homepage to inspire you every day. Choose any topic and wallpaper for your startpage. Stress less and feel more confident!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best homepage to inspire you every day. Choose any topic and wallpaper for your startpage. Stress less and feel more confident! 

THE MOST INSPIRING START PAGE
– 3,000+ daily affirmations to inspire you
– 13 topics to choose from, from "Think positively", to "Attract love" and "Reduce anxiety"
– 55 beautiful background photos to choose from
– 4 background collections: Landscapes, nature, cosy and monochrome

TOPICS
– Think positively: Change your mindset to be more optimistic.
– Reduce anxiety: Feel at peace instead of stressed and anxious.
– Personal growth: Become the strongest, best version of you.
– Be confident: Transform your self-confidence and self-belief.
– Love yourself: Think in a more self-accepting loving way.
– Better relationships: Build a better mindset for great relationships.
– Develop gratitude: Increase your gratitude and appreciation.
– Improve your career: Transform your career and hit your goals.
– Attract love: Think in a way that attracts love and affection.
– Manifest wealth: Change your money mindset and improve finances.
– Stop overthinking: Think with more clarity and reduce messy thoughts.
– Find calm: Find your personal calm with peace and tranquility.
– Focus on your health: Become more aware and appreciate your health.

MORE FROM POSITIVELY
– You can discover 150+ lists of our favorite affirmations on our website!
– Download our app "Positively: Daily Affirmations" on the iPhone app store

THIS RELEASE (0.0.1)
– This is the first release of the Positively app! We hope you love it.

FEEDBACK
We'd love to hear your thoughts and feedback. Email us at:
positivelyteam@gmail.com

Thank you x
